short_summary: Tug and Barge Services for Maintenance Works
description: The contractor will provide tug, barge, and other services to support Canadian Coast Guard crews with the demolition and construction of existing aids to navigation within the southern Gulf Islands, BC and surrounding waterway areas.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
F1705-221406: Tug and Barge Services for Southern Gulf Islands

## Brief Description
The Canadian Coast Guard is seeking a contractor to provide tug, barge, and other marine services to support their crews with demolition and construction of aids to navigation in the southern Gulf Islands, British Columbia.

## Tender Details
| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3945258152-Doc3981285066 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3945258152 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Publication Date | May 17, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | June 12, 2023, 2:00 pm EST |
| Expected Contract Start Date | May 30, 2023 |
| Duration | Until August 23, 2023 |

## Procurement Details
| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Procurement Category | Service |
| Notice Type | Request for Proposal |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |
| Trade Agreements | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |

## Important Considerations
* The preference is for Canadian goods and/or services.
* The contract will require support infrastructure, including tug(s), barge(s), and excavation, and material handling equipment.
* The tender status is expired.

## Contact Information
| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Contact Name | Jason Smith |
| Contact Email | jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca |
| Attachment | None |
